apiAuth.title: Enter Gemini API Key
apiAuth.description: Please enter your Gemini API key. It will be securely stored in your system keychain.
apiAuth.getKeyPrefix: You can get an API key from
apiAuth.instructions: (Press Enter to submit, Esc to cancel, Ctrl+C to clear stored key)

authInProgress.timedOut: Authentication timed out. Please try again.
authInProgress.waiting: Waiting for auth... (Press ESC or CTRL+C to cancel)

loginRestart.message: You have successfully logged in with Google. Gemini CLI needs to be restarted.
loginRestart.instructions: Press 'r' to restart, or 'escape' to choose a different auth method.
